title: Check Loan Application Status
description: A customer who recently applied for a mortgage wants to know the status of their application.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and locate their pending mortgage application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully finds the customer's application in the system.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current status and any outstanding requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the application is 'Pending Underwriter Review' and requires one more pay stub.

tasks.description: Inform the customer of the status and clearly explain the outstanding requirement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the status and tells the customer how to submit the required document.
